description: Try our easy to follow Hidden Veg Spag Bol recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bolognese,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Sesame free,Beef,Mushroom,Zucchini,Soy free,Mince,Peanut free
name: Hidden Veg Spag Bol Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add onion and mince and cook for 5 minutes, breaking up mince with a large spoon, until onions are soft and mince is browned.

Add garlic, carrot, zucchini, mushrooms, tomato paste and herbs to pan and continue to cook for 3 minutes. Add passata and stock and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer, partially covered, for 15 - 20 minutes or until sauce has thickened. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
While the sauce cooks, prepare pasta according to packet instructions and drain. Divide pasta between bowls and top with bolognaise mixture. Sprinkle with Parmesan to serve.
